operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO chat_users (chat_id, user_id, participant_type, inviter_user_id, invited_at, joined_at, state, created_at) VALUES (:chat_id, :user_id, :participant_type, :inviter_user_id, :invited_at, :joined_at, :state, :created_at)

operation.name: SelectByChatId
operation.sql: SELECT id, chat_id, user_id, participant_type, inviter_user_id, invited_at, joined_at FROM chat_users WHERE chat_id = :chat_id

operation.name: DeleteChatUser
operation.sql: DELETE FROM chat_users WHERE chat_id = :chat_id AND user_id = :user_id
